Comments_List: This class helped further my essay writing, close reading, and literary analysis skills.
I learned how to do close reading of works by major English poets and how to think about their works alongside modern criticism.

I think that this course does a great job of encouraging students to think critically about the English canon and to compare major English poets from different time periods, presented in the order of their progression. I think it the course could be improved by offering more modern criticism as reading material in addition to the works of major English poets.

Yes, anyone can take this class. I didn't think I would like Middle English literature, but it ended up being much more engaging than I thought. The way the course/professors work make everything interesting and fun.
I would definitely recommend this course to another student because it exposes you to literary greats and it provides good foundation for reading material in other English courses.

Yes! I personally never thought myself a fan of Old English literature, however, Professor Saraceni made this class extremely enjoyable, intellectually engaging, and made me much more appreciative of the beauty behind this time period's texts.
